text.div:
Id: DT.IMMZ.D2.DT.Cholera.WCvaccines
Url: Decision Table Determine required vaccinations
Version: 0.2.0
Title: Decision Table Determine required vaccinations
Status: draft
Date: 2025-07-17 20:56:25+0000
Publisher: WHO
Description:

Determine required vaccinations
Knowledge Capability: computable
Related Artifacts:

References

  • WHO recommendations for routine immunization – summary tables (March 2023) (1)
Libraries:
DTs.Cholera
Actions:
Client is not due for cholera vaccination: Client is not due for cholera vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" For WC vaccines (Shanchol, Euvchol and mORCVAX), 2 doses should be given 14 days apart to individuals aged ≥ 1 year.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for cholera vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as client's age is under 1 year. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first cholera dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is due for cholera vaccination: Client is due for cholera vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for cholera vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as no doses have been given.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is not due for cholera vaccination: Client is not due for cholera vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for cholera vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered less than 14 days ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is due for cholera vaccination: Client is due for cholera vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due" –
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for cholera vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered more than 14 days ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Primary series is complete. Client is not due for cholera booster dose: Primary series is complete. Client is not due for cholera booster dose "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" "Completed the primary vaccination series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") = TRUE Revaccination is recommended where there is continued risk of Vibrio cholerae infection. For WC vaccines, revaccination is recommended after 3 years.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Primary series is complete. Client is not due for cholera booster dose
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with cholera booster dose as primary series was completed less than 3 years ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first booster dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Primary series is complete. Client is due for cholera booster dose: Primary series is complete. Client is due for cholera booster dose "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due" "Completed the primary vaccination series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") = TRUE
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Primary series is complete. Client is due for cholera booster dose
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as the primary series for cholera was completed more than 3 years ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is not due for cholera booster dose: Client is not due for cholera booster dose "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for cholera booster dose
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with cholera booster dose as the latest dose was administered less than 14 days ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is due for cholera booster dose: Client is due for cholera booster dose "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for cholera booster dose
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with cholera booster dose as the booster series is not completed and the latest cholera dose was administered more than 14 days ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Booster series is complete: Booster series is complete "Completed the booster series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") = TRUE
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Booster series is complete
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as the booster series for cholera was completed less than 3 years ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next booster series.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is due for cholera vaccination: Client is due for cholera vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due" "Completed the booster series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") = FALSE when dose 1 is administered
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for cholera vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as the booster series for cholera was completed more than 3 years ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

relatedArtifact.citation: WHO recommendations for routine immunization – summary tables (March 2023) (1)

action.title: Client is not due for cholera vaccination
action.description:
Client is not due for cholera vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

For WC vaccines (Shanchol, Euvchol and mORCVAX), 2 doses should be given 14 days apart to individuals aged ≥ 1 year.

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as client's age is under 1 year.
Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first cholera dose.

action.title: Client is due for cholera vaccination
action.description:
Client is due for cholera vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression: Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as no doses have been given.

action.title: Client is not due for cholera vaccination
action.description:
Client is not due for cholera vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered less than 14 days ago.
Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

action.title: Client is due for cholera vaccination
action.description:
Client is due for cholera vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

–

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered more than 14 days ago.
Check for contraindications.

action.title: Primary series is complete. Client is not due for cholera booster dose
action.description:
Primary series is complete. Client is not due for cholera booster dose
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
"Completed the primary vaccination series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") = TRUE

Revaccination is recommended where there is continued risk of Vibrio cholerae infection. For WC vaccines, revaccination is recommended after 3 years.

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with cholera booster dose as primary series was completed less than 3 years ago.
Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first booster dose.

action.title: Primary series is complete. Client is due for cholera booster dose
action.description:
Primary series is complete. Client is due for cholera booster dose
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
"Completed the primary vaccination series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") = TRUE

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as the primary series for cholera was completed more than 3 years ago. 
Check for contraindications.

action.title: Client is not due for cholera booster dose
action.description:
Client is not due for cholera booster dose
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with cholera booster dose as the latest dose was administered less than 14 days ago.
Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

action.description:
Client is due for cholera booster dose
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should vaccinate client with cholera booster dose as the booster series is not completed and the latest cholera dose was administered more than 14 days ago.
Check for contraindications.

action.title: Booster series is complete
action.description:
Booster series is complete
"Completed the booster series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") = TRUE

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as the booster series for cholera was completed less than 3 years ago. 
Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next booster series.

action.description:
Client is due for cholera vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
"Completed the booster series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") = FALSE when dose 1 is administered

expression.expression:
